Standard Operating Procedure (SOP)¶

Introduction¶

This SOP outlines the standard procedures for handling and processing data within the MATUR framework. It includes guidelines on various aspects such as data storage formats, analysis workflows, and tool usage.

SOP Contents:

  • HDF5 File Structure
  • Data Validation
  • MLPipeline: Philosophy and Structure
  • Container -> DataFrame Nomenclature

HDF5 File Structure¶

For detailed information on the HDF5 file structure, including groups, datasets, and attributes, refer to the HDF5 Structure section.
